suncertify.db
Class DatabaseManager

java.lang.Object
  suncertify.db.DBDataModel
      suncertify.db.DatabaseManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
URLyBirdDataManager
Direct Known Subclasses:
Data
public class DatabaseManager
extends DBDataModel
implements URLyBirdDataManager

This Class Manages the Database, implementing new functions in the URLyBirdDataManager interface for data access flexibility and extensibility to Manage the database records

Author:
Segun

                throws URLyBirdException

isRecordADuplicate

public boolean isRecordADuplicate(java.lang.String[] uniqueKeys)
This function looks into all the record in the database using the argument provided to query the unique key values of each URLyBirdHotel Object record in the database

Parameters:
uniqueKeys - Array of String length 2 that represents the unique keys i.e Hotel Name and Location
Returns:
true if record is duplicate or false if no duplicate found occurrence found

getEmptyRowNumber

public int getEmptyRowNumber()
This function loops/look into the database records and check flag of each record to know the flag value as required to (possibly reusing a deleted entry) else a new record is added to the database record . i.e next row

Returns:
the Integer value of the recNo/row Number of the found space to slot a new record into the application
